item.title: biography
item.description: Education: MA Drawing, Camberwell College of Art, London, 2004 BA (hons), Fine Art and Art History, Goldsmiths College, London, 1999 // Solo exhibitions: Memory of Clothes, Worthing Museum, February till June 2019 info / blog Rabley Drawing Centre, Wiltshire, 2015 Brood, Bend in the River, Gainsborough, 2011 Residency Exhibition â€“ Rabley Drawing Centre, Wiltshire, 2009 images Things from the Thames, BEARSPACE, London, 2005 images New Works II, selected new graduate, Farnham Maltings, Surrey, 1999

item.title: news
item.description: Recent and upcoming: Feeling for Murmuration, Arthouse 1, London, March 6th - 28th. Unfortunately due to unforeseen circumstances this exhibition has been cancelled. // The Faraway Nearby, Rabley Gallery, Wiltshire, opening March 14th 5 - 7pm. Exhibition continues till April 19th. Artists include: Prudence Ainslie, Amy-Jane Blackhall, Helen Barff, Katherine Jones, Rebecca Salter RA, Meryl Setchell Ainslie, Sally Taylor Gallery info: http://www.rableydrawingcentre.com/rabley-drawing-gallery-exhibitions.htm // Solo exhibition, The Stone Space, London, June 2020

item.title: rabley
item.description: Residency at Rabley Drawing Centre, 2009 - situated on a working farm in a dry river valley, Wiltshire.
